DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study demonstrate efficacy SPD489 compare placebo adult ( 18 55 year age inclusive ) moderate severe Binge Eating Disorder Visit 8 ( Weeks 11 12 ) measure number binge day ( defined day least 1 binge episode occur ) per week assess clinical interview base subject diary
DOC.brief_title: SPD489 Adults Aged 18-55 Years With Moderate Severe Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Subject 1855 year age . 2 . Subject meet follow DSMIVTR criterion diagnosis BED : Recurrent episodes binge eat . An episode binge eat characterize following : eating , discrete period time ( eg , within 2hour period ) amount food definitely large people would eat similar period time similar condition , sense lack control eating ( eg , feel one stop eat control much one eating ) . The binge eat episode associate least 3 follow : eat much rapidly normal ; eat uncomfortably full ; eat large amount food feeling physically hungry ; eat alone embarrass much one eating ; feel disgust oneself , depress , feel guilty overeating . Marked distress regard binge eating . The binge eating occur , average , least 2 day week 6 month . The episodes binge eat occur exclusively course bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . 3 . Subject 's BED least moderate severity subject report least 3 binge eating day per week 14 day prior Baseline Visit ( Visit 0 ) document subject 's binge diary . A binge day day least 1 binge eat episode occurs . 4 . Female subject must negative serum B HCG pregnancy test negative urine pregnancy test . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Subject concurrent symptom bulimia nervosa anorexia nervosa . 2 . Subject receive psychotherapy ( eg , supportive psychotherapy , cognitive behavior therapy , interpersonal therapy ) weight loss support ( eg , Weight Watchers ) BED within 3 month . 3 . Subject use psychostimulants facilitate fast diet part BED within 6 month . 4 . Subject lifetime history psychosis , mania , hypomania , dementia , ADHD . 5 . Subject consider suicide risk opinion investigator , previously make suicide attempt , currently demonstrate active suicidal ideation . Subjects intermittent passive suicidal ideation necessarily exclude base assessment investigator . 6 . Subject known history symptomatic cardiovascular disease , advanced arteriosclerosis , structural cardiac abnormality , cardiomyopathy , serious heart rhythm abnormality , coronary artery disease , serious cardiac problem . 7 . Subject recently initiate treatment lipidlowering medication ( within past 3 month ) . 8 . Subject history moderate severe hypertension . 9 . Subject female pregnant nursing . 10 . Subjects bariatric surgery , lap band , duodenal stent , procedure weight loss .
